attributes.action: Do an interview on BBC Radio 2 with Russell Brand
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Russell Brand is requesting an interview with Mr Brown, to be broadcast on his radio show, on BBC radio 2. Radio 2 is a publicly funded organisation as is the government. Please sign this and have to new PM interviewed by Mr Brand.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
